alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick; Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Newberry, Edgefield, west central Lexington, northwestern Aiken, Saluda and east central McCormick Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ninety Six Historic Site to 9 miles west of Saluda County Airport to 6 miles northeast of Clarks Hill Recreation Area. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesburg-Leesville, Edgefield, Saluda, Johnston, Prosperity, Ridge Spring, Saluda County Airport, Edgefield County Airport, Aiken Municipal Airport, Monetta, Trenton, Silverstreet, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Saluda Co Sheriff`s Office, Good Hope, Northside Fire Station Main, Hollywood Elementary School, Emory, and Cleora. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 20 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
